title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – No Melvin Gordon leverage; Texans' front office red flags; Niners' Robbie Gould problem; NFC West O/U picks; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – No Melvin Gordon leverage; Texans' front office red flags; Niners' Robbie Gould problem; NFC West O/U picks; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.

In this episode, Middlekauff explains why Melvin Gordon doesn't have any leverage over the Chargers to holdout for a huge new deal, why the Texans front office issues are a huge red flag, why Robbie Gould is crazy for not sucking it up and playing for the Niners. He also gives his NFC West O/U picks, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
